title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: The Chinese embassy has condemned the Home Affairs Minister for what's being described as a "malicious slur" that has severely damaged Australia's relationship with Beijing. Peter Dutton is being criticised for suggesting Australia has every right to "call out" any country that skirts the law, or threatens democratic values. Mr Dutton has made it clear he has no issue with the Chinese community but says he won't stand for intellectual property theft, or hacking attempts on government systems. Image: News Corp Australia
